description:
The main characters, Himari Aozora and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, enter Paradise Private Academy.
Himari, who aspires for AIPRI, dreams of making 10,000 friends! But for the shy and anxious Himari, it might be a bit difficult...

Himari unexpectedly makes her AIPRI debut!?

She has a "secret" she can't even tell her best friend, Mitsuki! But it seems that Mitsuki has a "secret" of her own...

Secret-bearers Himari and Mitsuki's AIPRI begins!!

(Source: Official Website, translated)
hashtag: #アイプリ #ひみつのアイプリ

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Advertisement
tags.description: Produced in order to promote the products of a certain company.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Boarding School
tags.description: Features characters attending a boarding school.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

node.description:
**Education:** Yoyogi Animation Academy

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/junichifujisaku)

Junichi Fujisaku is a Japanese director, animation director, scriptwriter, game producer and novelist. He's affiliated with studio Production I.G.

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/izumi-mori) | [Twitter](https://x.com/mori_izumimi)

Izumi Mori is a Japanese composer, part of the musical duo *IZUMI SAKI*.
Hun-Cheol Choi is an animator and character designer.

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/izumi-mori) | [Twitter](https://x.com/mori_izumimi)

Izumi Mori is a Japanese composer, part of the musical duo *IZUMI SAKI*.

[Profile (Avex Pictures)](https://avex-pictures.co.jp/lineup/58780/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fujidera_minori/)

She entered and competed in the NEXT Voice Actor Artist Audition, and was selected for the role of Auru Omega.

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/izumi-mori) | [Twitter](https://x.com/mori_izumimi)

Izumi Mori is a Japanese composer, part of the musical duo *IZUMI SAKI*.
